advisories.title: Afternoon thunderstorms near Kinigi
advisories.summary: Rwanda Meteorology projects rain bands from 14:00-18:00 with slippery trails.
advisories.details: Carry waterproof boots and gloves. Trek duration may extend by 30 minutes if troop relocates downhill.
actions: Share ETA updates with concierge if trek extends

advisories.title: Speed checkpoint near Ruhondo bridge
advisories.summary: Local police operating 40 km/h checkpoint between Musanze and Kigali after 16:00.
advisories.details: Driver briefed to carry insurance docs and trip manifest. Expect a 5 minute stop for verification.
actions: Message concierge if stop exceeds 10 minutes
